name: General -  Pitch Why should I care about Watson Content Hub?

text.value:
Content is at the heart of the customer experience. But content poses challenges for both lines of business and development. For example the Line of Busoness needs to get th emost relevant content to their customers via the right channel much faster.

In such cases non-web channels are a particular issue. Just think of our current conversation as an example.

With Watson Content Hub as a headless CMS allows you to create a omni-channel solution to support all customer touch-points.
